title: Aligarh Muslim University students protest, demand quashing of FIR over ‘Holi brawl’ | Lucknow News - The Indian Express
selftext: Waah bhe wah. Aurangzeb ke style me jizya start karega to shivaji ke style me swarajya bhi start karna hoga
comments: Mob lynching is good but not the POLICE FIR . They should have there name cut off from the university . Seriously whats inside there mind . I wanna know .

The Muslim students are right. If we are banning burqa and namaz in unis, then we should also ban holi and other religion celebrations. 

Either accommodate all or eliminate all.
why tf ppl going to study in amu
